Issue.creator: ryjones
Issue.summary: CLONE - Merge PR & redeploy sovrin.org to correct link to GST
Issue.description: The changes to sovrin repos mean that the link from the docs page sovrin.org points to the old GST file.I have edited the .html and submitted a pull request: https://github.com/sovrin-foundation/sovrin.org/pull/1The related ticket (SOV-229) involves improvements to the GST itself, but the link can and should be corrected independently of that.
